section.p: A condition is a clinical statement that a clinician is particularly concerned about and wants to track. It has important patient management use cases (e.g. health records often present the problem list as a way of summarizing a patient's medical history).

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-146)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-147)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-148)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@nullFlavor = "NA" NA (not applicable) (CONF-149)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.19 ProblemActStatusCode STATIC (CONF-CONSOL-525)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF-CONSOL-526)
The effectiveTime element records the starting and ending times during which the concern was active.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime/low element (CONF-CONSOL-520)
[OCL]: not self.effectiveTime.low.oclIsUndefined()
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime/high element if statusCode@code=completed or aborted (CONF-CONSOL-521)
[OCL]: (self.statusCode.code = 'completed' or self.statusCode.code = 'aborted') implies not self.effectiveTime.high.oclIsUndefined()
SHALL NOT contain effectiveTime/high element if statusCode@code=active or suspended (CONF-CONSOL-522)
[OCL]: (self.statusCode.code = 'active' or self.statusCode.code = 'suspended') implies self.effectiveTime.high.oclIsUndefined()
